data.text: @Anthony_Wooley @MAHarbs Not you, Anthony!
@StmCh_ I believe you do too.

@StmCh_ @Anthony_Wooley Nothing to debate. I’m just a troll. It is only my opinion that you introduce inflammatory, platitudinal, and reductive statements to promote your Twitter. But Twitter is old news. You should spread your wings on YouTube, but then again you would have to learn to be meaningful.
@Anthony_Wooley No problem brother- I know my science, so it’s kind of fun.
@StmCh_ @MAHarbs Nope, what you do is your business.  I in now way looked down on you for not doing it.  If I seemed that way I apologize.  It was never my intent.  :)
@StmCh_ I guess I’m lucky to live in miss.  No one asks me.   I rarely mention it unless someone brings it up. I’ve never asked anyone about it.   Sorry they are harassing you.
@Anthony_Wooley Yes. Everyone of my doctors, 1/2 my family, and almost every Democrat in office/media/tech.
@Anthony_Wooley @StmCh_ No https://t.co/WSknLU9R0A
@TEXAS__TERRY @StmCh_ Welp, better listen to how many troops there will be, cause that's next.
@TEXAS__TERRY @StmCh_ https://t.co/dFRQElgcg5
@MAHarbs You’re very welcome.
@StmCh_ Oh dear such drama. Thanks Mr Provocative 🧐 https://t.co/yxI3lrUlbC
@StmCh_ Lot of people pushing at you?
@StmCh_ I agree
@StmCh_ People should just mind their business.
@StmCh_ My wife and son got it on Tuesday.   Both sick as dogs yesterday.   I refuse.   Wife seem a bit better today.  NOT A NORMAL VACCINE
@Vertigo1776 @StmCh_ @MLB I've gone my entire life without attending an MLB game so I think I can make the rest of my life without attending one.

@StmCh_ They are either totally blind to truth or they are a plant from the enemy of our souls Stay away from those who recently had it 
Until they can show there is no shedding  Dr Sharri Tenpenny gives good warning about this exposure She is one of top jab  experts in our country
@StmCh_ Standing with you!

@StmCh_ @KyraGebhardt1 Don't blame you, I won't either ! Driving is better than flying,
if I can't get somewhere without flight, not worth going !
@StmCh_ Was asked by boss if I would travel to support company's mission. Told him I would, but not looking forward to 'the stick' required for travel. Might mean no travel.
@StmCh_ You and your family come first and there are no apologies needed. My family is the same and my children are adults. No vaccine, no guinea pig trials for my family either.

@StmCh_ @LICondosHomes Good for https://t.co/OUbW7Cmd48 family have had it, not my choice, I haven’t due to diabetes but was tested by a hospital, 2 blood amd 2 swabs...all negative. Papers in hand from my doctor and the car park attendant insisted he test me again at the airport 👇👇
@TEXAS__TERRY @StmCh_ Well, if that's the case, why not just take off the mask and let it happen naturally.  No shots.
@StmCh_ That’s been a topic in my school district..I put my 2 cents in ant told them what I thought..many of the parents on the page agreed when I said that their kids would be the guinea pigs...
@StmCh_ Same brother, same.
@StmCh_ I'm with you.

@StmCh_ Right? Why are people even pushing this so hard!? It’s not even a proven vaccine yet - there is insufficient data on it. It’s still considered experimental! No thanks.

And advocating that kids should get it!? GTFOH. NOPE. Not happening. 🙄
@StmCh_ 👏👏👏
